s.text: I would rather not sound like a member of the PC police, but Jeffrey Goldberg talking about his opposition to Jews marrying gentiles in "My Nanny Problem" strikes me as almost racist, and definitely xenophobic.

If we replaced the current property tax on land and buildings with a tax falling solely on the value of land, vacant lots in cities and along the roads leading out of them would be built upon, instead of held for speculation.
To that end, you might say that the conspicuous absence of Jewish issues is the problem.
